mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* NonItemMasterWorkOptionalMapper_001 */ m_non_item ( system_country_code, system_brand_code, non_item_code, apply_start_date, apply_end_date, non_item_type, pos_item_name, unit_retail, g_dept_code, major_category_code, tax_rate, tax_type, tax_kind, discount_flag, create_user_id, create_datetime, create_program_id, update_user_id, update_datetime, update_program_id ) SELECT system_country_code, system_brand_code, non_item_code, apply_start_date, apply_end_date, non_item_type, pos_item_name, unit_retail, g_dept_code, major_category_code, tax_rate, tax_type, tax_kind, discount_flag, #{createUserId}, #{createDatetime}, #{createProgramId}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateDatetime}, #{updateProgramId} FROM m_non_item_if WHERE lot_num = #{lotNum}
